description:
Pre-order to get Navirou's "King" and "Queen" Outfits! Set out on your adventure with Navirou dressed as these classic monsters!

*Outfits purchased will become available for use as the game progresses. You can change Navirou's outfits from the "Navirou's Outfits" option in the Chest in Your House.
*This content may be made available separately at a later date.
*These outfits are purely cosmetic and only change Navirou's appearance.
name: Navirou's Outfits: "King" and "Queen"
